name: Wacky Toon Solitaire
description:
Enjoy your time with this funny wacky solitaire game!
It is the classical version of Solitaire with a 52 card deck!! Play and enjoy a cartoonic solitaire experience without ads!

Features:
- Awesome comic drawings
- wacky Solitaire game
- play offline!
- five languages supported ( Deu,Fra,Swe,Rus,Eng)
- 2 difficulties: Easy and Hard
- Character design by mikemac2d
- Does not require an internet connection nor has it ads

How to play:
Pile up all cards on the top left corner on their corresponding pile and start with an ace.
